body:
So, a lot of people have been making threads asking if they should get windows 10, or what the performance is, so I'm gonna make a thread with articles that contain information about Windows 10. Right now I'm kind of in a hurry, so I only have two to add, but later I will add a lot more.

MaximumPC Review: http://www.maximumpc.com/windows-10-review/

Windows 10 Vs. 7 & 8.1 Performance Tests: http://www.maximumpc.com/windows-10-but-what-about-performance/

Engadget Features Review: http://www.engadget.com/2015/08/04/windows-10-features-you-should-know-about/

TechRadar Reluctance to Upgrade Article: http://www.techradar.com/us/news/software/operating-systems/techradar-survey-reveals-consumers-reluctance-to-upgrade-to-new-windows-10-pcs-1301120
